__e: The good news is,she doesn't have an autoimmune condition, so she doesn't need a bone marrow transplant, and we were able to stop the irradiation in time.
They told me a lot of marrow got into my blood and that I should expect to find myself thinking differently.
I want to find out more about when Dekker worked there, like, maybe there's people there who still know him, and like especially if he's talked about The Marrow and all this stuff before.
